welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burntwood, United Kingdom! Prepare to be enchanted by the quaint charm of this historic city, known for its beautiful parks and rich heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Burntwood has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply select the network and follow the prompts to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
